subject: Delegation of Power for approval of Project Proposal of De-scoped Works on EPC Mode under Bharatmala Pariyojana -reg.
text: "Ram 7c4 rTHTfqiferarrut (Tsw5 #aev &r rTHPf 4ART4, HR TRGR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) Hrra T 61-5 Qa 6, #ar-10, ERa, #f @oaft 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 T/Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAI/ Policy Guidelines/ Delegation of Power/ 2025 Policy Circular No.18.100/2025 dated 07th January, 2025 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/CMD/DOP/2022 (Comp. No.152962)} Sub: Delegation of Power for approval of Project Proposal of De-scoped Works on EPC Mode under Bharatmala Pariyojana -reg: Guidelines and SOP for implementation of Bharatmala Pariyojana dated. 03.11.2017 & 21.12.2017 for appraisal and approval of Projects provide as under: All PPP BOT (Toll) Projects, irrespective of the size and cost, where no grant (or VGF) is given to the Concessionaire and the construction and maintenance is financed by toll revenues will be appraised and approved by Board of NHAI: (ii) All PPP BOT(Annuity) or BOT(HAM) Projects costing upto Rs. 2000 Cr. (TPC excluding land cost) will be appraised by SFC chaired by Secretary, MoRTH and approved by Minister (MoRTH) (iii) All PPP BOT (Annuity) or BOT (HAM) Projects costing more than Rs. 2000 Cr. (TPC excluding land cost) will be appraised by PPPAC chaired by Secretary, DEA and approved by CCEA (iv) All PPP Projects, which need VGF Grants from Government, shall be appraised and approved as per extant guidelines of DEA applicable for VGF support: All EPC Projects implemented by NHAI under this program shall be approved by NHAI Board after proper appraisal, within the budgeted financial resources approved under this program. (vi) Further, NHAI Board   shall also be authorized to suitably delegate its powers on appraisal and approval of Projects within NHAI: (vii) All decisions of change of mode of execution will be taken by the Board of NHAI or MoRTH; for their respective roads, subject to availability of funds and other required conditions. (viii) Individual Projects under the program that involve Revised Cost Estimates shall be considered and approved by the Concerned Authority which has accorded approvals to the Project as per the above guidelines, subject to cumulative financial commitments of all such Projects being within the allocation approved for this program: Contd_2I - M1 T 7 9_ NHAI
